meanings.definition: A decorative, often elaborate, curl or twist in a design or pattern.
meanings.sent1: The invitation had a fancy curlycue at the bottom.
meanings.sent2: She drew a curlycue on the corner of the page.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with a curlycue made of frosting.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting had a curlycue that danced across the paper.
meanings.sent5: The garden gate was adorned with an intricate curlycue design.

meanings.definition: To form or make a curlycue.
meanings.sent1: She carefully curled the ribbon into a curlycue.
meanings.sent2: He likes to curlycue his signature at the end of letters.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to curlycue the border of the painting.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to curlycue its way through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The baker would always curlycue the icing on the cupcakes beautifully.
